elements.name: question1
elements.title: The most important source of law today is unwritten law.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: Today, written law (constitution, laws, ordinances) is of the greatest importance.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: If a judge cannot find a rule in the written law, he cannot pass judgment.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: The judge must nevertheless make a judgment. In doing so, he either relies on customary law or, if there is no customary law, he establishes a rule himself and decides according to it (Art. 1 para. 2 CC).
